metadata.title: CVE-2015-0272 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
GNOME NetworkManager allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(IPv6 traffic disruption) via a crafted MTU value in an IPv6 RouterAdvertisement (RA) message, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-8215.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
